extendedInfo.description: Calculate and track how economically you are driving.Display details in MPG or litres per 100 kilometres.Simple calculation of fuel fill distance travelled and price.Don't leave questions or problems in the comments, drop us an email and we'll respond. If you leave a comment we can't get in touch to help out which leaves us all frustrated!MyBackup Integration Support.Ad+Stats Supported.Internet permission is for Adverts and Statistic gathering (Admob + Flurry).SD Card permission is for backing up the database to SD and so that you can export to CSV to the same place. Both of these go to a "Fuel Use" folder.If you've got problems get in touch, we can't fix problems or help you if you don't.Leaving 1 star comments saying it doesn't work is of no use to anyone!

reviews.title: Is what it is
reviews.comment: it does what it seems to do, it is a very useful app for people who like to see where their money and where there a gas is going
reviews.author: Brian Adam

reviews.comment: Awesome app with a great developer had an issue emailed them and they fixed issue right away! Exellent communication great app couldn\'t ask for better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great On Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: I only check my mpg occasionally, this app is great as it lets you input the mileage from the trip odometer rather than the main odometer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: it always force closed, every time try to use it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful app.
reviews.comment: Great for UK users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful App
reviews.comment: I have found no faults with this app. Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good, but I wish there was a graph for pence per mile, rather than just telling you once, when you enter the data
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Top app. Really straight forward to use, nice .csv export feature. Please support multiple cars...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Straightforward and effective. Would be even better with multiple vehicle functionality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks nice, but gives error when using km/litre
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it and use it, though cannot change the currency. More car support would be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs to support multiple vehicles. Good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would like to enter current mileage, not distance between refill.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fab. Exactly what I need. Have average consumption line on graph?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what I was looking for. Would be nice with custom settings for the graph, data export and the option to change notes. Used w/Nexus froyo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Durrrrrrrrr I don\'t get it. Do I put the miles I just drove and how much gas I used to fuel up or what I have no idea how this works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wish you could track more than one car at a time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just a great application. I particularly like the \'litres\' in \'mpg\' out ! Brilliant !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Have used this app for almost 2 years, it has always been dependable & helped me track mileage quickly and easily.
reviews.author: A Google User
